meanings.definition: Compounds found in plants that have antioxidant properties.
meanings.sent1: Polyphenols in green tea can help protect cells from harm.
meanings.sent2: Many fruits like berries contain polyphenols that are good for you.
meanings.sent3: The polyphenols in grapes are like tiny shields for your body.
meanings.sent4: Her skin glowed as if she had bathed in a pool of polyphenols.
meanings.sent5: Imagine polyphenols as tiny superheroes fighting off cell damage.

meanings.definition: Substances that can help prevent damage to cells in the body.
meanings.sent1: Including polyphenols in your diet can shield your cells from harm.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend foods rich in polyphenols to protect your body.
meanings.sent3: The polyphenols acted like bodyguards for the fragile cells.
meanings.sent4: Her cells rejoiced as the polyphenols formed a protective barrier.
meanings.sent5: Polyphenols are like invisible shields safeguarding your cells.

meanings.definition: Nutrients that are beneficial for overall health.
meanings.sent1: Eating foods with polyphenols can boost your health.
meanings.sent2: Polyphenols are essential nutrients for a healthy body.
meanings.sent3: The polyphenols danced happily in her system, promoting wellness.
meanings.sent4: Her vitality increased as she consumed more polyphenols.
meanings.sent5: Polyphenols are like health warriors fighting for your well-being.
